message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1400000.  It's a valuable asset, and I believe this price reflects its worth. Let's see if we can make a deal.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to offer $1300000 for it.
Bob,  I understand your position.  I'm willing to come down to $1350000. This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product, and it gives us both a chance to make this deal work.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose an offer of $1325000 for the product.
